meanings.definition: Having a certain amount of income or revenue.
meanings.sent1: The family was revenued enough to afford a nice vacation every year.
meanings.sent2: She was happy to be revenued sufficiently to cover all her expenses.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed quite revenued with the amount of treats it received.
meanings.sent4: The garden, with its blooming flowers, looked as revenued as a wealthy estate.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in colors as revenued as a prosperous business.

meanings.definition: Provided with a source of income or revenue.
meanings.sent1: The company was well-revenued due to its successful investments.
meanings.sent2: Being revenued allowed him to support his family without worry.
meanings.sent3: The treehouse looked so revenued with all the decorations the kids added.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as revenued as a treasure chest full of gold coins.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed steadily, as revenued as a reliable stream of income.
